item.title: Flare-On 2022 - anode
item.description: Challenge Description You’ve made it so far! I can’t believe it! And so many people are ahead of you! Basic Static Analysis We are given a Windows 64-bit executable. > file * anode.exe: PE32+ executable (console) x86-64, for MS Windows If we check the file description we can see that we are dealing with a javascript file. description,Node.js: Server-side JavaScript It’s a huge executable. > ls -lsh anode.exe 55M -rw-rw-r-- 1 remnux remnux 55M Sep 26 08:08 anode.
